t: Peak Design congratulates Amazon for copying its signature sling bag so well
s: March 3, 2021 - Peak Design, a maker of fine bags and accessories, has a problem: Amazon appears to have copied its popular bag, the $99.95 Everyday Sling, with its own $32.99 Amazon Basics Camera Bag. It was even called Everyday Sling until Peak Design’s video.
